name: McDonald's Monogatari: Honobono Tenchou Ikusei Game
overview: McDonald's clerk impersonator game! Players will be assigned to McDonald's "Happy Town Store" as a store manager apprentice. For three years here, I will work hard to become a store manager by improving the skills of five part-time workers, aiming for a store that is loved by the people of the city. Improve your skills and part-time job skills with 5 types of mini-games such as "cash register" and "hamburger cooking". Fun events occur by communicating with part-time workers and people in the city! Love, marriage and a wonderful life await! If you input the menu you want to eat today, the combination will tell you today's fortune.
